results.definition: the 3rd planet from the sun; the planet we live on
a connection between an electrical device and a large conducting body, such as the earth (which is taken to be at zero voltage)
the concerns of this life as distinguished from heaven and the afterlife
the solid part of the earth's surface
examples: the earth shook for several minutes

results.definition: the loose soft material that makes up a large part of the land surface
examples: they dug into the earth outside the church

results.definition: hide in the earth like a hunted animal
once thought to be one of four elements composing the universe (Empedocles)
the abode of mortals (as contrasted with Heaven or Hell)
